井井有條.definition: everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy

井水不犯河水.pinyin: jǐng shuǐ bù fàn hé shuǐ

井然有序.definition: everything clear and in good order (idiom); neat and tidy

井田.definition: the well-field system of ancient China

井繩.definition: rope for drawing water from a well
